sn7.7:1.2: Atha kho suddhikabharadvajo brahmano yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavata saddhim sammodi.
sn7.7:1.3: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi.
sn7.7:1.4: Ekamantam nisinno kho suddhikabharadvajo brahmano bhagavato santike imam gatham ajjhabhasi:
sn7.7:2.4: So sujjhati na anna itara paja”ti.
sn7.7:5.1: Evam vutte, suddhikabharadvajo brahmano bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn7.7:5.3: annataro ca panayasma bharadvajo arahatam ahositi.
